verbs.description: sorry smokers there [V: is] [ARG1: no such thing as safe e - cigarettessorry smokers] there is no such thing as safe e - cigarettes multiple studies completed indicate that e - cigarettes are not a safe alternative to cigarettes research indicates users have an increased risk of lung damage and heart attack fda commissioner scott gottlieb u s scientist university of california scott gottlieb lung inflammation san francisco
